description:
Their summer weight Vasquez Microstripe Hoodie ticks all the boxes, guaranteeing tall men a unique solution to their clothing problems. Made of a breathable, soft, and lightweight bamboo blend this is the tall shirt you will never want to take off.

Don’t settle for “Big & Tall” shirts that are too baggy and ill-fitting. Their entire line of clothing is designed specifically for tall slim guys. They conceived the Vasquez Microstripe Hoodie to be the ideal hooded long-sleeve shirt for the tall, slim guy.

The Vasquez microstripe is a dynamic long-sleeve shirt that will have you feeling comfortable as well as looking great in any situation. It can also be layered with other heavier weight hoodies from their collection and worn throughout the winter.

Their Vasquez Microstripe Hoodie has a longer list of features than you can write on a tall guy's arm span. From the exceptional fabric they use, to the perfect long and slim fit - they are passionate about every aspect of the clothing they produce.

The proven anti-odour properties of bamboo make this hooded long sleeve shirt for tall guys a must-have in your wardrobe. The cut is ideal for tall slim guys and the look is perfect for any occasion.
.
name: Navas Lab Apparel Vasquez Microstripe - Hooded LS Tall Shirt - Mens
